https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s9o2qkkPH4EdC2tgFG2wIWKMoeJ.jpg Estrella, an intelligent teen student, spends most of her time alone at school or home, enjoying horror books and movies, while her widow mother Angela works as a nurse in a hospital. Her favorite author is Stephen King and her only friends are Leatherface and a vampire. A Real Friend
